Room.Name: Cave of Restless Spirits
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a cave filled with ghosts of deceased mages.
Room.LongDescription: The cave seems to moan out at you. Every so often, you catch a glimpse of a ghost wandering around the cave. The ghosts appear afraid and too weak to leave the cave which gives them their strength. They have been banished here until the evil of Keslar Palace has been removed.
